comment.author: 78454400@N00
comment._content: Please add all of the photos in this set to the group I just created simply named, Celilo Falls. I believe it is important that we never forget the true costs of industrialization. It is also my hope that some day this natural wonder be returned to the peoples of this region and to the salmon that once swam in it's swift waters. Thank you for your consideration. Celilo Falls
